description.value: Scenario 1.8, test 1/2, part 1 for eOverdracht receiving systems. This test (part 1 and part 2 together) focuses on the negotiation phase ('aanmeldfase') where a receiving xis agrees to transfer the patient at the proposed date and time. After completion of this test, the test for the transfer phase ('overdrachtfase') can be run.

nts:include.description: At the sending XIS, a new Task is created in status 'requested'.

nts:include.name: Await new Task notification
nts:include.description: The sending XIS sends a notification to the receiving XIS because a new Task has been created with status 'requested'.

description.value: The receiving XIS should perform a read on the Task after receiving a notification that the Task has been created.
After reading the Task, the receiving XIS should perform a read operation on the advance notice Composition that is referenced on Task.input.
